doc:
James Farley (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Farley_(actor) 0 James Farley, (January 8, 1882 – October 12, 1947) was an American character actor of the silent and sound film eras. Born in Waldron, Arkansas in 1882, he made his film debut in the 1916 silent film, Sins of Her Parent. During his thirty-year film career he appeared in over 200 films and film shorts, including over 175 feature films. Farley worked right up until his death; his final film was released after his death, 1948's Man from Texas. The production of the film ended in early June 1947, and Farley died shortly after, on October 12, 1947, in Pacoima, California. James_Farley , ( January_8_,_1882 – October_12_,_1947 ) was an_American_character_actor of the_silent_and_sound_film_eras . Born in Waldron , Arkansas in 1882 , he made his_film_debut in the_1916_silent_film , Sins of Her_Parent . During his_thirty-year_film_career he appeared in over_200_films_and_film_shorts , including over_175_feature_films . Farley worked right_up until his_death ; his_final_film was_released after his_death , 1948 's_Man from Texas . The_production of the_film ended in early_June_1947 , and Farley died shortly_after , on October_12_,_1947 , in Pacoima , California .
